title: Ink
description: “It’s a good day to die.”My mother holds my arm fiercely.“But as you grieve for me, listen forthe voices.Then, you must get the ink.”Sparrow stumbles between two worlds,light and dark, love and hate, what is realand what is in her mind.When her mother dies on the Reservation,Sparrow’s world is shadowed with angerand narrowed by pain. The voices arrive,but are they real? And how can a tattoomake her stronger?
author: S.J. Davis
